誰もが夢の中で踊り続けた
google_translated: Everyone continued to dance in my dream

en_text: You proud stray dog, do you still remember?
jp_text: お前は まだ覚えているだろうか
google_translated: Do you still remember you?

en_text: Do you remember that summer of love,
jp_text: あの愛の夏を…
google_translated: That love summer ...

en_text: in which you ran and danced and fought in the purple haze?
jp_text:
紫の煙の中で
走って踊って戦った—
google_translated:
In purple smoke
Run and danced and fought-
